description: This configuration allows you to manage core identity and access settings across your application, including user authentication, role-based permissions, and customization options.

groups.name: Applications
groups.description: Manage the registered applications that utilize the system for authentication and access control.

entities.label: appcustomfieldvalues
entities.description: Values assigned to app custom fields

groups.name: Authentication
groups.description: Configure authentication methods such as login mechanisms, multi-factor authentication (MFA), and identity providers.

entities.label: userapploginproviders
entities.description: Login providers used by users per app

groups.name: Users
groups.description: View and manage user accounts, including details, statuses, and assigned roles.

entities.label: usercustomfieldvalues
entities.description: Custom field values set by users

groups.name: Roles and Permissions
groups.description: Define and assign user roles and permissions to control access to different parts of the system.

groups.name: Custom Fields
groups.description: Create and manage additional user attributes to tailor the user profile structure to your needs.

entities.label: fieldentities
entities.description: Entities that can have custom fields

entities.label: view_customfieldsappdetails
entities.description: View of app-specific custom field details

groups.name: Miscellaneous
groups.description: Access additional configuration settings that do not fall under the other categories.
